original_title: State of Play: Rise of the King
overview: It's the second documentary installment on professional gaming in South-Korea.  It tells the story of Jong-Hyeon Jeong, better known as IM-Mvp, and chronicles his transformation from a troubled Starcraft: Broodwar player with the Woongjin Stars team to one of the most successful Pro-Gamers in eSports history.
tagline: We don't play for fun. We play for work.
title: State of Play: Rise of the King
